title: Scikit-Learn Estimators and Pipelines
description: In this lab, we will learn about different ways to display estimators and pipelines using scikit-learn. Estimators and pipelines are an essential part of the scikit-learn package, allowing us to build and evaluate machine learning models.

meta.title: Scikit-Learn Estimators and Pipelines | Machine Learning
meta.description: Learn how to display estimators and pipelines using scikit-learn, an essential part of building and evaluating machine learning models.
meta.keywords: scikit-learn, estimators, pipelines, machine learning, data science
